name: Wayward Bee
description:
Oh no! Wayward Bee doesn't know where their beehive is! Let's help them find it! Hint - Check every tree to find the Bee's hive. Hive location changes every play through!

Controls:
WASD - Move Bee
Space - Fly 
Mouse - Move Camera
This was a game developed for the Global Game Jam 2021 - "Lost & Found"

Credits:
Matthew Schreiner - Developer
Mica Pettibone - 3D Artist
Kate Mcqueen - Bee Model and Animations
Lloyd Summers - Music
David Rogers - Beehive Model
